aboutpage.header_title: CUSTOMS MATTERS ARE OUR ENTIRE WORLD
aboutpage.header: You’ve probably heard of many dynamically growing customs service companies. It’s tough :-). We started in 1998 as a small company in Lublin offering typical customs services. Now our services cover a broad range, and satisfied clients have been coming back to us for years.
aboutpage.ourstory: We have been operating in the customs services market since 1998. Over this time, through hard and honest work, we have achieved a high position in the industry, earning the trust of both companies and individuals. We may not be a large company, but we always prioritize professionalism and competence.

tile_1.title: Foreign Trade:
tile_1.description: Export, admission to free circulation including personal effects. We also specialize in economic procedures.

tile_3.title: Customs Consulting:
tile_3.description: Representation before customs and tax authorities.

tile_4.title: Written Translations:
tile_4.description: Standard and sworn translations in all languages of the world.

tile_5.title: Customs and Tax Documents:
tile_5.description: Preparation of documentation for importing vehicles from the European Union, Switzerland, Norway, USA, Canada, and others.

tile_6.title: Excise and Tax Declarations:
tile_6.description: Filling out AKC-US declarations, applications for excise tax exemption on vehicles for individuals and businesses.

whyus.whyus_description: Our clients include both large companies with whom we maintain long-term cooperation and individuals needing one-time advice. Our offer is aimed at everyone who needs reliable and competent customs service.

tile_1.title: We Know How to Minimize Costs

tile_2.title: Experience and Tailor-Made Solutions
tile_2.description: We have seen a lot and are rarely surprised. We solve problems that have no answers online.

tile_3.title: Forwarder Support
tile_3.description: Individual care from the forwarder and fleet department.

tile_6.title: We Treat Each Client Differently
tile_6.description: We know that the average user does not exist. Our staff helps clients without categorizing and using templates.

aboutpage.header: For many years, we have been expanding the range of our services. Below you will find what we do on a daily basis...

customsagency.customsagency_paragraph_1: We carry out customs clearances at the Customs Office in Lublin.
customsagency.customsagency_paragraph_2: We handle customs clearances on behalf of our clients in the procedure for admission to free circulation and export.

subsections.subsection_1: motor vehicles, collector’s items brought from so-called third countries (USA, Canada, Switzerland, Norway) as well as from European Community countries
subsections.subsection_2: postal shipments - at any Customs Office in Poland.
subsections.subsection_3: live animals: dogs, cats, horses, and other animals.
subsections.subsection_4: clearances with exemption from customs duties, so-called RELOCATION PROPERTY, and others.
subsections.subsection_5: motor vehicles, collector’s items brought from so-called third countries (USA, Canada, Switzerland, Norway) as well as from European Community countries

customsagency.customsagency_paragraph_4: We also welcome clients clearing goods from and to the United Kingdom, Scotland, Ireland from 01.01.2021.
customsagency.customsagency_paragraph_5: We provide interested companies with expedited EORI numbers.

sworntranslations.sworntranslations_paragraph_1: In our business, we also arrange for sworn and standard written translations upon client request.
sworntranslations.sworntranslations_paragraph_2: These can be any documents such as diplomas, certificates, vehicle documents, and others.
sworntranslations.sworntranslations_paragraph_3: We fulfill translation orders from any foreign language to Polish, from Polish to any foreign language, and from any foreign language to any other foreign language.

subsections_1.subtitle: Completion Times
subsections_1.subsection_1: vehicle documents – instantly to a few business days – depending on the translated language.
subsections_1.subsection_2: other documents – completion time arranged individually with the client.

subsections_2.subtitle: Sample Price List for Vehicle Documents:
subsections_2.subsection_1: German – Germany, Austria, Switzerland - from 40.00 to 120.00 PLN (complete) depending on the vehicle's country of origin.
subsections_2.subsection_2: French – Belgium, France, Switzerland, Luxembourg – 70.00 PLN per document.
subsections_2.subsection_3: Dutch – Netherlands, Belgium – 60.00 PLN per document.
subsections_2.subsection_4: English – (UK, USA, Canada) agreement/invoice – 60.00 PLN per translation page*, CERTIFICATE OF OWNERSHIP/REGISTRATION DOCUMENT – 100.00 PLN per document.
subsections_2.subsection_5: Italian – Italy – 90.00 PLN per translation page*.
subsections_2.subsection_6: Norwegian – Norway – agreement – 120 PLN per translation page*.

sworntranslations.customsagency_annotation: * (a translation page is 1125 characters per page).
sworntranslations.customsagency_paragraph_4: We also welcome clients clearing goods from and to the United Kingdom, Scotland, Ireland from 01.01.2021.
sworntranslations.customsagency_paragraph_5: We provide interested companies with expedited EORI numbers.
